text:
This is a basic Tiddlywiki run on Node.js with a few configurations, namely a [[Custom JSON Exporter|$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-exporter]] and the [[Publishing Buttons|$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-button]] {{$:/images/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-button}}.

The buttons will add or remove a "Published" tag to current tiddler and export the content of all tiddlers tagged "Published" to the [[published.json]] file. This file gets imported in the Next.js frontend app.
title: Welcome to Nextjs-with-TiddlyWiki
$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-button
caption: {{$:/core/images/export-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Publish/Caption}}
text: \define tv-action-refresh-policy() always \define publish-actions() <$action-setfield $field="published_date" $value=<>/> <$action-listops $tags="Published"/> <$wikify name="json-export" text={{{ [[$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-exporter]get[text]] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="published.json" $field="text" $value=<> /> <$/wikify> \end \define publishButton() <$list filter={{$:/config/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-display-filter}}> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Publish/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Publish/Caption}} class=<> actions=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/images/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="Export to JSON tiddler"/> \end <>

\whitespace trim
`[
		`<$list filter={{$:/config/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/export-filter}} counter="counter">
			`{
				"title" : "`<$text text={{{[title<currentTiddler>]}}}/>`",
				"published_date" : "`<$text text={{{ [{!!published_date}] }}}/>`",
				"slug" : "`<$text text={{{[<currentTiddler>slugify[]]}}}/>`",
				"text" : "`
					<$wikify name="description" text={{{ [<currentTiddler>get[text]] }}} output="html">
					<$text text={{{ [<description>jsonstringify[]] }}}/>
					</$wikify>
				`",
				"excerpt" : "`
					<$wikify name="description" text={{{ [<currentTiddler>get[text]split[ ]first[30]join[ ]] }}} output="html">
					<$text text={{{ [<description>jsonstringify[]] }}}/>
					</$wikify>
				`",
				"cover_image" : "`<$text text={{{[<currentTiddler>get[cover_image]]}}}/>`"
			}`<$list filter="[<counter-last>!match[yes]]">,</$list>
		</$list>`
]`
title: $:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-exporter
$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/published-button
caption: {{$:/core/images/export-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Publish/Caption}}
text: \define tv-action-refresh-policy() always \define publish-again-actions() <$action-setfield $field="published_date" $value=<>/> <$wikify name="json-export" text={{{ [[$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-exporter]get[text]] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="published.json" $field="text" $value=<> /> <$/wikify> \end \define publishedButton() <$list filter={{$:/config/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/published-display-filter}} > <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Published/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Published/Caption}} class=<> actions=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/images/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/published-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="Export to published.json"/> \end <>

title: $:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/unpublish-button
caption: {{$:/core/images/export-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Publish/Caption}}
text: \define tv-action-refresh-policy() always \define unpublish-actions() <$action-deletefield $field="published_date"/> <$action-listops $tags="-Published"/> <$wikify name="json-content" text={{{ [[$:/plugins/dd/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/publish-exporter]get[text]] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler="published.json" $field="text" $value=<> /> <$/wikify> \end \define unpublishButton() <$list filter={{$:/config/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/published-display-filter}} variable=nul> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Unpublish/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Unpublish/Caption}} class=<> actions=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/images/nextjs-with-tiddlywiki/unpublish-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="Unpublish (remove from published.json"/> \end <>
